original: intros m k x z Hmap Hsucc. unfold cA_1, cA, B, pred_dec, succ_dec. destruct Hmap. - destruct Hsucc. + subst. simpl. destruct (eq_dart_dec x z). * subst. reflexivity. * destruct (eq_dart_dec (cA m k z) z); [contradiction|]. destruct (eq_dart_dec (A m k x) z); [|reflexivity]. destruct (eq_dart_dec (bottom m k x) z); reflexivity. + simpl. destruct (eq_dart_dec (A m k x) z); [reflexivity|]. destruct (eq_dart_dec (bottom m k x) z); reflexivity. - destruct Hsucc. + subst. simpl. destruct (eq_dart_dec x z). * subst. reflexivity. * destruct (eq_dart_dec (cA m k z) z); [contradiction|]. destruct (eq_dart_dec (cA m k (bottom m k z)) z); [|reflexivity]. destruct (eq_dart_dec (A m k x) z); [reflexivity|]. destruct (eq_dart_dec (top m k x) z); reflexivity. + simpl. destruct (eq_dart_dec (A m k x) z); [reflexivity|]. destruct (eq_dart_dec (bottom m k x) z); [subst; contradiction|]. destruct (eq_dart_dec (top m k x) z); reflexivity.
